org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap

类 HeapAggregatingState<K,N,IN,ACC,OUT>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap.AbstractHeapState<K,N,SV,S,SD>
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap.AbstractHeapMergingState<K,N,IN,OUT,ACC,AggregatingState<IN,OUT>,AggregatingStateDescriptor<IN,ACC,OUT>>
        • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.heap.HeapAggregatingState<K,N,IN,ACC,OUT>
  • 类型参数:
    K - The type of the key.
    N - The type of the namespace.
    IN - The type of the value added to the state.
    ACC - The type of the value stored in the state (the accumulator type).
    OUT - The type of the value returned from the state.
    所有已实现的接口:
    AggregatingState<IN,OUT>, AppendingState<IN,OUT>, MergingState<IN,OUT>, State, InternalAggregatingState<N,IN,OUT>, InternalAppendingState<N,IN,OUT>, InternalKvState<N>, InternalMergingState<N,IN,OUT>

    public class HeapAggregatingState<K,N,IN,ACC,OUT>
extends AbstractHeapMergingState<K,N,IN,OUT,ACC,AggregatingState<IN,OUT>,AggregatingStateDescriptor<IN,ACC,OUT>>
implements InternalAggregatingState<N,IN,OUT>
    Heap-backed partitioned ReducingState that is snapshotted into files.

    • 构造器详细资料

      • HeapAggregatingState

        public HeapAggregatingState(AggregatingStateDescriptor<IN,ACC,OUT> stateDesc,
                            StateTable<K,N,ACC> stateTable,
                            TypeSerializer<K> keySerializer,
                            TypeSerializer<N> namespaceSerializer)
        Creates a new key/value state for the given hash map of key/value pairs.
        参数:
        stateDesc - The state identifier for the state. This contains name and can create a default state value.
        stateTable - The state table to use in this kev/value state. May contain initial state.
        namespaceSerializer - The serializer for the type that indicates the namespace

    • 方法详细资料

      • get

        public OUT get()
        从接口复制的说明: AppendingState
        Returns the current value for the state. When the state is not partitioned the returned value is the same for all inputs in a given operator instance. If state partitioning is applied, the value returned depends on the current operator input, as the operator maintains an independent state for each partition.

        NOTE TO IMPLEMENTERS: if the state is empty, then this method should return null.

        指定者:
        get 在接口中 AppendingState<IN,OUT>
        返回:
        The operator state value corresponding to the current input or null if the state is empty.

      • add

        public void add(IN value)
         throws java.io.IOException
        从接口复制的说明: AppendingState
        Updates the operator state accessible by AppendingState.get() by adding the given value to the list of values. The next time AppendingState.get() is called (for the same state partition) the returned state will represent the updated list.
        指定者:
        add 在接口中 AppendingState<IN,OUT>
        参数:
        value - The new value for the state.
        抛出:
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the system cannot access the state.

      • mergeState

        protected ACC mergeState(ACC a,
                         ACC b)
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        指定者:
        mergeState 在类中 AbstractHeapMergingState<K,N,IN,OUT,ACC,AggregatingState<IN,OUT>,AggregatingStateDescriptor<IN,ACC,OUT>>
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
